Structures in this file are for internal use of library only

This is documentation of internal SDL_Config structures, and as such, it’s not for normal library user.

This file should be included only once in SDL_config_lib.h (hence no compilation guards).

Summary
Structures in this file are for internal use of library onlyThis is documentation of internal SDL_Config structures, and as such, it’s not for normal library user.
Types
CFG_Internal_ValueVector
CFG_Internal_EntryEncapsulates single entry with its value.
Variables
valueList of strings (or single string) which is holding unconverted value.
orderUsed to sort entries during save operation in the same order as in file they were originally read from.
pre_commentString which is holding comment that was found before entry definition, ie.
post_commentString which is holding comment that was found after entry definition, ie.
pre_comment_type
post_comment_typeCurrently for padding, maybe in later versions it will contain type of post comment (now it’s not needed).
typeDepending on “type”’s value, “value” is treated and converted differently.
CFG_Internal_GroupKeeps entries of all types in single text-based map.
Variables
multi_value_iteratorIt’s a “pointer” to entry which is used for multi value iteration.
entry_iteratorUsed for entry iteration.
orderUsed to sort groups during save operation in order as in file they were originally read from.
next_entry_orderNext created entry will have such order.
post_commentString which is holding comment that was found after group definition, ie.
pre_commentString which is holding comment that was found before group definition, ie.
pre_comment_type
CFG_Internal_File
Variables
groupsMap which contains all groups.
original_groupsContains all groups (the same as groups) sorted in order in which they were found in cfg file.
selected_groupSelected group.
group_iterator, reverse_group_iteratorAfter every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.
original_group_iteratorIf you’re iterating over groups in original order, after every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.
iteration_direction1 means we’re iterating to front (group_iterator) -1 means we’re reverse iterating (reverse_group_iterator)
iteration_sortCFG_SORT_ALPHABET or CFG_SORT_ORIGINAL
global_groupGlobal group is not stored directly in map, because we would have to reserve some kind of ID for global group name.
next_group_orderNext created group will have such order.
filenameName of hard-drive file, which was used to create this CFG_Internal_File.

Types

CFG_Internal_ValueVector

List of stringscontains the multiple values of single entry.

CFG_Internal_Entry

typedef struct CFG_Internal_Entry

Encapsulates single entry with its value.  Sizeof ( CFG_Internal_Entry ) with padding = 20.

Summary
Variables
valueList of strings (or single string) which is holding unconverted value.
orderUsed to sort entries during save operation in the same order as in file they were originally read from.
pre_commentString which is holding comment that was found before entry definition, ie.
post_commentString which is holding comment that was found after entry definition, ie.
pre_comment_type
post_comment_typeCurrently for padding, maybe in later versions it will contain type of post comment (now it’s not needed).
typeDepending on “type”’s value, “value” is treated and converted differently.

Variables

value

CFG_Internal_ValueVector value

List of strings (or single string) which is holding unconverted value.

order

Uint32 order

Used to sort entries during save operation in the same order as in file they were originally read from.

pre_comment

CFG_String pre_comment

String which is holding comment that was found before entry definition, ie.

// pre comment entry = value

post_comment

CFG_String post_comment

String which is holding comment that was found after entry definition, ie. entry = value // post comment

pre_comment_type

Uint8 pre_comment_type

Type of pre comment

0no comment
1//, ; or #
2C like

post_comment_type

Uint8 post_comment_type

Currently for padding, maybe in later versions it will contain type of post comment (now it’s not needed).

type

Uint8 type

Depending on “type”’s value, “value” is treated and converted differently.

Possible values for “type” are

  • 0: reserved
  • CFG_BOOL: bool
  • CFG_INTEGER: integer
  • CFG_FLOAT: float
  • CFG_TEXT: text

CFG_Internal_Group

typedef struct CFG_Internal_Group

Keeps entries of all types in single text-based map.  Sizeof ( CFG_Internal_Group ) with padding = 32.

Summary
Variables
multi_value_iteratorIt’s a “pointer” to entry which is used for multi value iteration.
entry_iteratorUsed for entry iteration.
orderUsed to sort groups during save operation in order as in file they were originally read from.
next_entry_orderNext created entry will have such order.
post_commentString which is holding comment that was found after group definition, ie.
pre_commentString which is holding comment that was found before group definition, ie.
pre_comment_type

Variables

multi_value_iterator

CFG_Internal_EntryMapItor multi_value_iterator

It’s a “pointer” to entry which is used for multi value iteration.

entry_iterator

CFG_Internal_EntryMapItor entry_iterator

Used for entry iteration.

order

Uint32 order

Used to sort groups during save operation in order as in file they were originally read from.

next_entry_order

Uint32 next_entry_order

Next created entry will have such order.

post_comment

CFG_String post_comment

String which is holding comment that was found after group definition, ie.  [group] // post comment

pre_comment

CFG_String pre_comment

String which is holding comment that was found before group definition, ie.  // pre comment [group]

pre_comment_type

Uint8 pre_comment_type

Type of pre comment

0no comment
1//, ; or #
2C like

CFG_Internal_File

typedef struct CFG_Internal_File
Summary
Variables
groupsMap which contains all groups.
original_groupsContains all groups (the same as groups) sorted in order in which they were found in cfg file.
selected_groupSelected group.
group_iterator, reverse_group_iteratorAfter every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.
original_group_iteratorIf you’re iterating over groups in original order, after every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.
iteration_direction1 means we’re iterating to front (group_iterator) -1 means we’re reverse iterating (reverse_group_iterator)
iteration_sortCFG_SORT_ALPHABET or CFG_SORT_ORIGINAL
global_groupGlobal group is not stored directly in map, because we would have to reserve some kind of ID for global group name.
next_group_orderNext created group will have such order.
filenameName of hard-drive file, which was used to create this CFG_Internal_File.

Variables

groups

CFG_Internal_GroupMap groups

Map which contains all groups.

original_groups

CFG_Internal_OriginalFileGroupMap * original_groups

Contains all groups (the same as groups) sorted in order in which they were found in cfg file.  If this pointer is 0, then this information has to be created by calling appropriate function (lazy evaluation).  If it’s not 0, it it deleted in CFG_CloseFile.

selected_group

CFG_Internal_Group * selected_group

Selected group.  Always should point to vaild group.

group_iterator, reverse_group_iterator

After every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.

original_group_iterator

CFG_Internal_OriginalFileGroupMapItor original_group_iterator

If you’re iterating over groups in original order, after every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.

iteration_direction

int iteration_direction

1 means we’re iterating to front (group_iterator) -1 means we’re reverse iterating (reverse_group_iterator)

iteration_sort

int iteration_sort

CFG_SORT_ALPHABET or CFG_SORT_ORIGINAL

global_group

CFG_Internal_Group global_group

Global group is not stored directly in map, because we would have to reserve some kind of ID for global group name.  Instead, we store it in object, treating it differently also in other ways in other places.

next_group_order

Uint32 next_group_order

Next created group will have such order.

filename

CFG_String filename

Name of hard-drive file, which was used to create this CFG_Internal_File.

typedef struct CFG_Internal_Entry
Encapsulates single entry with its value.
CFG_Internal_ValueVector value
List of strings (or single string) which is holding unconverted value.
Uint32 order
Used to sort entries during save operation in the same order as in file they were originally read from.
CFG_String pre_comment
String which is holding comment that was found before entry definition, ie.
CFG_String post_comment
String which is holding comment that was found after entry definition, ie.
Uint8 pre_comment_type
Uint8 post_comment_type
Currently for padding, maybe in later versions it will contain type of post comment (now it’s not needed).
Uint8 type
Depending on “type”’s value, “value” is treated and converted differently.
typedef struct CFG_Internal_Group
Keeps entries of all types in single text-based map.
CFG_Internal_EntryMapItor multi_value_iterator
It’s a “pointer” to entry which is used for multi value iteration.
CFG_Internal_EntryMapItor entry_iterator
Used for entry iteration.
Uint32 order
Used to sort groups during save operation in order as in file they were originally read from.
Uint32 next_entry_order
Next created entry will have such order.
CFG_String post_comment
String which is holding comment that was found after group definition, ie.
CFG_String pre_comment
String which is holding comment that was found before group definition, ie.
Uint8 pre_comment_type
typedef struct CFG_Internal_File
CFG_Internal_GroupMap groups
Map which contains all groups.
CFG_Internal_OriginalFileGroupMap * original_groups
Contains all groups (the same as groups) sorted in order in which they were found in cfg file.
CFG_Internal_Group * selected_group
Selected group.
CFG_Internal_OriginalFileGroupMapItor original_group_iterator
If you’re iterating over groups in original order, after every change in functions that iterate, it’s dereferenced and its value is assigned to selected_group.
int iteration_direction
1 means we’re iterating to front (group_iterator) -1 means we’re reverse iterating (reverse_group_iterator)
int iteration_sort
CFG_SORT_ALPHABET or CFG_SORT_ORIGINAL
CFG_Internal_Group global_group
Global group is not stored directly in map, because we would have to reserve some kind of ID for global group name.
Uint32 next_group_order
Next created group will have such order.
CFG_String filename
Name of hard-drive file, which was used to create this CFG_Internal_File.
